name: Safari 15.1
available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Catalina

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Catalina
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to code execution
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Catalina
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to unexpectedly unenforced Content Security Policy
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

cves.credit: Narendra Bhati (@imnarendrabhati) of Suma Soft Pvt. Ltd.

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Catalina
advisories.impact: A malicious website using Content Security Policy reports may be able to leak information via redirect behavior
advisories.description: An information leakage issue was addressed.

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Catalina
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A buffer overflow issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Chijin Zhou of ShuiMuYuLin Ltd and Tsinghua wingtecher lab

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Catalina
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to universal cross site scripting
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.
